item.title: [ LeetCode #937 ]
item.description: [ LeetCode #937 ] Reorder Log Files ë¡œê·¸ íŒŒì¼ ì¬ì •ë ¬ # [ LeetCode #937 ] Reorder Log Files ë°”ë¡œê°€ê¸° # ğŸ’¡ ìœ ìš©í•œ ì§€ì‹ # ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì •ë ¬ # ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì •ë ¬ index ë°˜í™˜ index = sorted(range(len(s)), key = lambda x : s[x]) s = [s[i] for i in index] # string split listë¡œ sort s.sort(key = lambda x: (x.split(' ')[1:], x.split(' ')[0])) # í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì´ìš©í•œ sorting def fn(s): return s[0], s[-1] sorted(a, key=fn) sorted(a, key=len) ë¬¸ì œ # You are given an array ofÂ logs.
